entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Whitehorse
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:09 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whitehorse Airport 04:52 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -14.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -17.5°C
Wind: S 33 km/h gust 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Drifting snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Occasional drifting snow. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
